I am Khalil Idris

I specialize in web applications and product design

View My Work

I Specialize In

Creating digital concepts of products and UI/UX layouts for web applications

Concepting

I draw out several sketches by hand to get different variations of the client's vision.

UI/UX

I begin to digitally draw out the skeleton of those sketches using Figma and Framer X.

Visual Design

Create polished visual design details for each web and app page.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are detailed and well thought out to best fit the clients' needs.

1

Discuss The Project

I discuss the project details with my clients. I gather all necessary references and inspirations for the their vision.

2

Brainstorming & Concepting

After discussing with my client(s), I compare the different variations of hand drawn sketches.

3

UI/UX Planning

I digitally recreate those hand drawn sketches several times.

4

Interaction

Client receives final product within the timeline of terms.
